disabilityCapitalUVGSalary.description: Disability capital x times the annual salary. For personGroups, only values ip to 9-fold are allowed.

disabilityCapitalSurplusSalary.description: Disability capital surplus x times the surplus annual salary. For personGroups, only values ip to 9-fold are allowed.

disabilityCapitalProgUVGSalary.description: Disability capital progressive of the UVG salary in %. No progression corresponds to the value 100%.

disabilityCapitalProgSurplusSalary.description: Disability capital progressive of surplus salary in %. No progression corresponds to the value 100%
